website_summaries.verdict: A chic bathroom mirror that offers plenty of space and boasts a look and feel all its own.
pros: Features a heavy-duty mirror hanger that consists of 2 interlocking brackets, ensuring you can install the mirror in just minutes
Includes a built-in bubble level to guarantee the mirror is level at all times
Minimalist style is sure to grab your attention
Masterfully constructed from superb materials, which means the mirror can serve you well both now and in the future
cons: Mirror is heavy in comparison to similar options

customer_reviews.title: Bad mount
customer_reviews.text: I hung 2 of these mirrors in my bathroom. The mount for these mirrors is janky. They rest on a small ledge. While cleaning it with spray and a paper towel it lifted up off the mount and came back down on the countertop and broke.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a master bath reno...other than them NOT being delivered in the prime 2-day guarantee (which unfortunately happened to way too many packages this holiday) these are great and I love the hanging system that comes with a mini level. I hung these by myself with no help from the hubs needed. Always a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: kbf

customer_reviews.title: Great product, elegant design, clean and easy mounting.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror with a very clean look with flush mount! The mirror came well packaged and as described. The mounting hardware is very high quality and built in leveling bubble makes accurate mounting easy. The size is perfect for a single vanity and adds a luxurious appearance to my bathroom. The mirror would also work well as a stand alone accent piece in an entry. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: zachery f smith

customer_reviews.title: Included mounting hardware is garbage
customer_reviews.text: Mirror is nice, should have listened to my instinct telling me the mounting hardware looked flimsy and poor. Upon trying to use it, it disintegrated. Used regular dry wall anchors to mount the bracket to the wall and all is good. Save yourself the time and just throw the included hardware in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: little bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love the simple look of this mirror and it's very easy assembly. Unfortunately it's not a good design for the stability of hanging this mirror. After my husband set it up and hang it on the wall, and when I start to clean it, the mirror almost fell down. Luckily my husband caught it, but still have a little crack because of this accident. I was going to return it, but at this moment I have a think another way to make sure it's not going to fall.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: My biggest priority, almost always, is to be able to install a product without any help from others, that the product has good installation instructions, and that all the parts are truly in the box and correct. This product conforms to those requirements and was easy to install, it is attractive, and the mirror is not so heavy that you cannot work with it well. I used this for 2 areas that are part of a Jack and Jill bathroom and they look great. I recommend this product and may buy it again when I remodel the master bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: CUshopping

customer_reviews.title: Great value oval mirror
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Did two mirrors in less than 15 minutes total. Comes with a handy little level . Also the mirrors can easily to taken off and hung back up. Easier to clean better and hangs very sturdy. Would buy again and also recommend
customer_reviews.author: David Ivantsov

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The picture does this mirror no justice. It is heavy and well made. Comes with everything you need except a decent level. But once you get it setup it is very sturdy. Very smart hanging setup. Easy to clean and will not move. The weight of the mirror adds to the sturdiness. Will not sit flush but close enough and looks amazing, great shipping packaging also, KUDOS!
customer_reviews.author: Martin De La Plum

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend purchasing this item. It is definitely not worth the money at all. I ordered two for our master bathroom. Neither came with the hanging apparatus as featured. Additionally, I had to use several different products on the glass to remove the glue from stickers on the glass. Even though the size was what we needed, I will worry every time I clean the mirrors that they will fall off the wall and break. Buy something else!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Kelley

customer_reviews.title: recommend using the brackets if you have small children who ...
customer_reviews.text: Crisp reflection free of distortions. Check the product dimensions: it is around the expected size of most bathroom mirrors. The included brackets allow for simple installation and sufficient stability. I would not, however, recommend using the brackets if you have small children who are inclined to press against the mirror; the brackets, after all, make for a hanging mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly in her dorm, added some lights too
customer_reviews.text: This mirror fit perfectly a dorm room. My college kid added some lights too (Lvyinyin Vanity Lights Kit Hollywood Style Makeup Light Bulbs) for extra effect which like the mirror arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ward

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Well pleased with this mirror. I replaced a rectangular mirror in a small lavatory. This hangs over an antique wash stand and looks nice, plus tall enough to accommodate wider range of heights than previous mirror. I did add a small stick on felt piece like I use on my furniture to protect the wood floors. Others had mentioned it wobbled, but this makes it secure.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Maria

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror, Super Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy mirror. We are in the process of remodeling our bathrooms, and were originally hesitant to purchase mirrors online. Amazed at how easy it is to install on the wall. The bracket is well designed. Very impressed with the solid metal construction and seamless frame. And it LOOKS BEAUTIFUL! Our bathroom looks like a high-end spa bathroom. Brings the entire bathroom together. Going to buy the matte black version for our second bathroom upstairs when the time comes. A++!
customer_reviews.author: MomEllie

customer_reviews.title: Reflecting Perfection
customer_reviews.text: We had difficulty locating a mirror to fit our small bathroom. This mirror was perfect! Shippped in one day, packaged safely and the directions were simple. Husband was able to have it hung in under 5 minutes. Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, quality mirror. Packaged well. Sits close to wall with included mounting brackets.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gresham

customer_reviews.title: Well packed and easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: The french cleat on the back made it easy to hang. I did add some small adhesive bumps towards the bottom to better stabilize it on the wall. I was *very* surprised when the mirror began to speak to my wife, telling her that she was the fairest in the land. Ultimately, though, Mr. Mirror Mirror just helps my spouse start the day with a smile, so we're going to keep him.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive, but very very nice mirror. It's packaged really well and the frame housing is also elegant and sturdy I got it on Amazon warehouse and it's missing the mounting bracket
customer_reviews.author: MaLouO

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, recommended
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about shipping a mirror but it was very well packaged and arrived safely. Nice mirror, simple as expected, although I don't love the way it mounts as it sticks out from the wall is wobbly. The mounting bracket would not allow it to fall but mirror moves it you touch it. Would order from this supplier again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Poor Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: The mirror had quality glass and a strong, quality frame. However, the frame was nicked, scuffed, and scratched. Since there was damage inside, next to the glass, it was obvious that the frame was abused in the factory before the mirror was assembled. Also, the black material between the glass and the frame was sloppy. It looked horrible, especially when the light above the mirror shined on it. I had to return it. This was not worth $230. The workmanship and frame condition would make it maybe $70.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. I actually purchased it to use as a night stand topper. Makes the stand more elegant and bounces light around especially when room is candlelit. My husband loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Included wall bracket not sent
customer_reviews.text: The whole reason I purchased this particular mirror was the mounting bracket. Seemed like it would be more secure on the wall. Unfortunately the wall bracket that corresponds with the bracket mounted on the mirror was not in the box when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mirror for my small half-bath. It arrived in perfect condition and was packed well. I used my own dry wall anchors and screws, and it took about 10 minutes to install. The bracket is only attached toward the top of the mirror, so take care when cleaning it. The tape left some stubborn glue on the corners and bottom, but I used goof-off and then cleaned it with ammonia free windex. It is a good quality mirror for the price.
customer_reviews.author: I. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Mirror was easy to ang and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is the perfect size and look over any bathroom sink! We liked it so much we purchased a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Schagelin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: there was nothing to dislike. The installation was easy, the glass quality is excellent, and the overall effect is sweet. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and simple.
customer_reviews.text: This was a simple, inexpensive solution to a tiny bathroom in a home I am renting. I did not want to spend a ton of money but wanted something pretty.
customer_reviews.author: ConsMom07

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror for the price! It was easy to install and seems quite sturdy on its support. I used heavy duty drywall screws instead of the ones it came with. My only complaint is that it bounced a little when cleaning it. To prevent any movement in the future, I attached Velcro to the foam piece and attached it to the wall. Simple solution!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror. It was received as described. Nice and bright, not dull at all. Can't wait for it to be installed in my newly remodeled bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: P2

customer_reviews.title: Broken Mirror
customer_reviews.text: The mirror came to me broken. I just opened the box and it was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to our master bath where we hung two ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to our master bath where we hung two over each sink, replacing the giant, rectangular builder-grade wall mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Loverde

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I had a really hard time finding a mirror this size at the home improvement stores. Found this on Amazon and it fits perfectly in the area I need and was packaged really well. No marks on the glass and really easy to install as long as you have a 9/32 drill bit.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly DiGiaimo

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy install but I wish there was some form of bottom hook as well.
customer_reviews.author: Fixit Guy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement for glass in Frame
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mirror to fit a frame I had, rather than buy new glass. Couldn't be happier! Mirror came extremely well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Beltway Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror. I want another one for my bathroom. It looks so perfect and was easy to install. I feel like it’s very sturdy on the wall. Only problem is I don’t think you can hang it horizontally, if you would want to.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Well made installed easy
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged really well. My husband had it up in a short amount of time. I bought two and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Barandiaran

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bathroom mirror for a great price. Looks great and fits in smaller spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond 3rd

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t use the mount that came with it but overall a very nice heavy mirror fit perfect in an old frame I scored at a yard sale.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Barber

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror used to update my bathroom. Nice size and crystal clear. Easy to install too.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were extremely clear and we were able to mount the mirror with ease. Just one question: the directions call for a 9/32 drill. Is there such a thing? A 1/4 drill worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mainer

customer_reviews.title: You can see yourself!
customer_reviews.text: It's a mirror, works as you'd expect. Dimensions as advertised (important since we were matching an existing medicine cabinet mirror). Packaged well, arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: frostbitten

customer_reviews.title: Chic
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the space we got it for (3/4 bathroom); minimalist, sleek, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is gorgeous and the price was perfect. Really easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: mandi curry

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror. Matched well with our new lighting. I really appreciated how it came well protected and delivery man was friendly
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged and beautifully made. Directions were clear and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Easy instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about the packaging, but came safely and well wrapped. Breeze to install, less than 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmys10

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is very nice, great quality and easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Big O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just love! Perfect in my remodel - great quality and easy install
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror! It's very nice quality and even the backing on it is very nice. The only drawback is that it is very heavy
customer_reviews.author: BobsYourUncle

customer_reviews.title: Finishing Touch to my new bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, no distortion, and I love the simple bevel which gives it an attractive flare.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ezyk

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Did it by myself in about 10 minutes. Nice large size. Crystal clear reflection. Shows every line on your face, unlike my old mirror (ugh!)
customer_reviews.author: J. Eastman

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: installed quickly and easily. there were sticky tape marks on it but i was able to get them off with a little work. the mirror wobbles a bit when cleaning but stays up.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Everything that you'll need to install this mirror is included except the screwdriver!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is absolutely beautiful! The installation was a breeze--there's even a little level included to make sure the cleat is even. From start to finish, installation took about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Priest

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and very easy to install, explicit instructions includes small spirit level!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this purchase. The mirror went up without a hitch. The built in level is very clever and it fit against the wall as described.
customer_reviews.author: Versco

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: campingirl

customer_reviews.title: and one like it for our new home
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mirror, and one like it for our new home. The ease of the hanging system was one main reason we purchased them. They are though, a light weight mirror with silver painted backs.
customer_reviews.author: Grams

customer_reviews.title: nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mirror- great value for the price. One small thing is the corner protectors left small adhesive marks in the corners that I can't get off.
customer_reviews.author: R Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Easy install with good directions
customer_reviews.text: Packing was protective, delivery not a problem. Easy install with good directions. Everything is made of highest quality materials. If you're mounting on drywall it comes with everything you need. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Love the mirror but we cannot install it.
customer_reviews.text: We bought an oval mirror. The product description says it can be installed horizontally or vertically. This is incorrect. Oval mirrors can only be installed vertically due to how the easy to install bracket is placed. Buyer be warned.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Pretty mirror with easy install
customer_reviews.text: Took me a long time before I found a decent size mirror for a fair price. This one was easy to hang as long as you are able to use some simple tools. Care should be taken to hang it as directed. Couldn’t be much easier.
customer_reviews.author: audrey cook

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror
customer_reviews.text: The anchors are cheap so the sturdiness is not great. Going to end up reinstalling it with other anchors. Good mirror for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Chapa

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror! Very good quality for the price and really easy to hang with the leveling bar included.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in the bathroom and the setup method is easy
customer_reviews.text: Bought a used one but it came with everyone just as knew. Looks great in the bathroom and the setup method is easy!
customer_reviews.author: AVF

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, great mirror. A little difficult to install but looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Quality mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy but my set of drill bits didn't include the very specific size this required so I had to go out and buy that too.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie B.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just hung it today and noticed some chips in the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Easy to install. This manufacturer knows what customer service is.
customer_reviews.author: VW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our project
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect mirror for over a bathroom vanity. Easy to install. Good $$
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann H

customer_reviews.title: Good price, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my salon & it is so cute & perfect size. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love this in my powder room. My father installed for me and he had no problem.
customer_reviews.author: nancyp111

customer_reviews.title: Yes, It's good. Buy one.
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and pretty mirror. Very well packaged, so it arrived in perfect condition. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very simple, classy mirror for a small bathroom. Just one of those "you can't go wrong" type of items.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES QUEALY

customer_reviews.title: The mirror was the perfect size for my newly remodeled bathroom
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was the perfect size for my newly remodeled bathroom. It was easy to mount on the wall. The price of the mirror was very affordable compared to some others stores.
customer_reviews.author: jshine67

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror amazing value
customer_reviews.text: The track installation for this is awesome. Beautiful mirror amazing value.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and it's very clear as oppose to a different brand I bought for my other bathroom with the exact same lighting my only complaint is that it's not that stable with the mounts attached to it one side of the mirror touches the wall and the other side is off the wall creating angle to it not a big deal unless you try to clean it and it's wobbles making it scary it's going to fall off I'm sure i can fix this issue with some thought into it. Just haven't had time
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our remodeled half bath. I really like the way it mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Jernigan

customer_reviews.title: Beveling is nice
customer_reviews.text: Used it over bathroom vanity. It could have been more substantial but for the money it’s nice.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn c

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror, great mounting system.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hanging system. It is pretty simple to hang and easy to remove the mirror for a through cleaning. You can clean the mirror in place just be careful not to push up hard enough to dismount the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the beveled edges! Easy to hang and move around as needed
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: The mounting system is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is dangerous. First time cleaning it and it started to fall. Luckily I was able to catch it. The mounting system is terrible. Certainly not recommended for a mirror that must get cleaned often such as in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Robert BGD

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Solid Mirror, great included mounting hardware. It did not work for my application so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Kreikemeier

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and easy to hang. Hung above a chest of drawers and it looks super.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt lie flush and was very difficult to install. My contractor guy hated it.

customer_reviews.title: Hanging System Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Mirror has nice bevel. Hanging system is easy. It came well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: As promised, the mirrors ( i bought two) came with everything you need. Was very easy. The mirrors look great. Such better quality than what was at HD or Lowes. Very well protected in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love these! Bought 2 for our bathroom - very ...

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful is the best work to say for these, I bought two for our master bath.......I don't wish I bought anything other than, wise decision!!

customer_reviews.title: Great for bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty. Set flush against the wall. Replaced with a cabinet mirror unit and made very small bathroom feel larger.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Love my new mirror! Super easy and quick to install. Sits securely on the bracket as advertised. Nice quality.

customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mom's bathroom and its very sturdy, gives a good touch worth the price.

customer_reviews.text: looks nice and sleek and easy to mount. Very modern.

customer_reviews.text: Ordered 5 of these and all arrived undamaged. Very easy to install.

customer_reviews.text: Yes, we received it. It has not been hung yet, still painting. I love it

customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror but not the look I thought it would create.

customer_reviews.title: Nice missing only protactors of rubber in the back so ...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it is exactly as I thought it would be.

customer_reviews.text: Very heavy but probably a good quality it was just more than what I wanted

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: is it great. I returned because we need big more than this
customer_reviews.author: Mariela Belett

customer_reviews.title: This mirror is fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I had a swivel mirror installed when I remodeled my bathroom and less than a year later the tiny screw in the mounting bracket worked loose (from swiveling) and the mirror fell off the wall. I needed a large mirror to replace it because the lights had been installed rather high so the mirror wouldn't hit them when it was swiveled, and this mirror was the perfect size. I'm really happy with the quality of the mirror itself and the bracket on the back for mounting is large enough to hold the weight and tilts the mirror slightly forward from the top, which satisfies the reason I purchase a swivel mirror initially.
customer_reviews.author: equuscycle

product_meta.title: Gatco Beveled Easy Mount Mirror, 31.5" H x 23.5" W, Silver
product_meta.description:
Size:31.5" H x 23.5" W| Style:Rectangle| Color:SilverMove toward a designer interior by incorporating Gatco’s flush mount mirror into your next remodel. Composed of the finest handcrafted float glass, this mirror makes no compromises when it comes to contemporary aesthetic. Features an elegant beveled edge and smooth rounded border. Complements any room, no matter how large or small. An excellent addition to your bathroom, shower room, bedroom, living room, guest room, entryway, hallway, or wherever a mirror may be convenient. Use this mirror for makeup, shaving, and going about your morning routine. Available in a variety of sizes with both oval and rectangle variations. Guaranteed to last a lifetime and backed by Gatco’s 100-year warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Since 1977, Gatco has been a leader in designing and manufacturing premium luxury bathware. Backed by our lifetime warranty, you can trust our products to always exceed your expectations and live up to their name. We proudly stand by our TRUE DESIGN and COMMITMENT TO EXCELLENCE.
feature_bullets: Enjoy a harmonious reflection with Gatco’s minimalist flush mount mirror.
An elegant approach to modern design, incorporating a smooth beveled edge and frameless construction.
Artisan Quality: Handcrafted and polished for timeless beauty and lasting sheen.
Features sleek diamond cut float glass ensuring longevity, durability, and dependability.
Includes the patented Hang-It Heavy Duty wall mounting system with built in level, for effortless installation in less than 10 minutes.
Easily mount this product in portrait or landscape on a variety of surfaces including tile, wood, and drywall.
Available in multiple size variations and shapes, including oval and rectangular.
Ensuring our excellence, Gatco products include a 100-year warranty.

specifications.Included Components: Mirror, mounting bracket, bubble level, screws
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars375 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
